steps.title: Draw two horizontal parallel rectangles.
steps.content: Draw two horizontal parallel rectangles. They should be the same width.

steps.title: Now draw two vertical rectangles.
steps.content: Now draw two vertical rectangles. These should also be the same width, but narrower, and somewhat "pulled in" from the edges of the horizontal ones.

steps.title: Now, inside the "frame" made by those four rectangles, draw two triangles towards the center, the tops of which should overlap.
steps.content: Now, inside the "frame" made by those four rectangles, draw two triangles towards the center, the tops of which should overlap.

steps.title: Following the triangles (red) draw slightly curved lines- this is the contour of the hourglass.
steps.content: Following the triangles (red) draw slightly curved lines- this is the contour of the hourglass. The connecting point of the lines should also be curved.

steps.title: Erase the red lines with a rubber.
steps.content: Erase the red lines with a rubber.

steps.title: Draw two curved lines which would represent the level of the sand.
steps.content: Draw two curved lines which would represent the level of the sand. Note: the bottom line should be more curved than the top line. Also, the more sand has already flown, the closer these lines should be to each other, and the more intense should the curves be.

steps.title: Draw another intensely curved line at the middle of the hourglass representing the sand falling through.
steps.content: Draw another intensely curved line at the middle of the hourglass representing the sand falling through.

steps.title: Color in the sand and draw a straight line (the flow of the sand).
steps.content: Color in the sand and draw a straight line (the flow of the sand).

steps.title: Add two short, straight, diagonal lines on the top and bottom of the hourglass, at opposite diagonal sides (the so-called "glass effect").
steps.content: Add two short, straight, diagonal lines on the top and bottom of the hourglass, at opposite diagonal sides (the so-called "glass effect").

steps.title: Draw two ovals on both ends of the cylinder.
steps.content: Draw two ovals on both ends of the cylinder.

steps.title: Draw two sharp arcs facing each other inside the cylinder.
steps.content: Draw two sharp arcs facing each other inside the cylinder.

steps.title: Based on the outline, draw the hourglass
steps.content: Based on the outline, draw the hourglass
